title: Joining a new project
prompt: You’re joining a new project and have 5 minutes with the team lead. What single question would surface the biggest unknown or risk?

title: Community board meeting
prompt: At a local community board meeting, a controversial new policy is introduced. What question would help uncover the root concerns behind the opposition?

title: Classroom discussion
prompt: A teacher asks the class to reflect on a recent novel, but most students are quiet. What question could spark genuine discussion?

title: New manager
prompt: You’ve just been assigned a new manager who leads very differently than your last. What question would help you quickly adapt to their expectations?

title: Team deadline pressure
prompt: Your team is behind on a major deadline. What question could uncover the main obstacle slowing progress?
